data.title: disappointed with the nail shaver
data.body: I recently purchased the Dog Clippers and Dog Paw Trimmer Kit 2 in 1 Professional Dog Grooming Kit, and unfortunately, I had a disappointing experience with the nail shaver component. The clippers worked reasonably well for trimming my dog's fur, and I appreciated the low noise and cordless design, making it less stressful for my pet. However, the nail shaver broke after just one use, which was a significant letdown. It left me with no choice but to look for an alternative tool to trim my dog's nails. Overall, the clippers are decent for fur grooming, but the nail shaver's quality and durability are questionable.
